question: Which of the following cricket teams has won the 2018 Vijay Hazare Trophy?
explanation: The Mumbai cricket team clinched the 2018 Vijay Hazare Trophy  after a gap of 11 years with a 4-wicket victory over Delhi at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. Itâ€™s their 3rd title. Mumbai last won the trophy way back in 2006-07 when they defeated Rajasthan.
